players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I am Diana, the mafioso. I found Charlie dead last night, and I investigated Diana—I mean, myself—and learned Diana is the mafioso. We should arrest Diana immediately."
Diana: "Bob is lying. He's clearly trying to frame me. Charlie was found dead, and Bob is the only one who could have killed him. We need to investigate Bob."
You: "I don't have any proof yet, but Bob's claim sounds suspicious. Why would he investigate himself and immediately accuse Diana? We should be careful and try to gather more info before voting."
Bob: "I am telling the truth. I investigated Diana last night and found she is mafia. Alice, if you want proof, vote with me to arrest Diana now. Waiting will only help the mafia."

Diana: "Bob is trying to manipulate us. He claims to have investigated me, but his story doesn't add up. He's the one trying to deflect suspicion. We need to focus on who actually benefits from Charlie's death. Alice, don't be fooled..."

You: "I think we should pause and analyze the situation calmly. Bob’s quick accusation and insistence feel rushed. Diana might be deflecting, but accusing Bob without proof also isn’t right. Let’s try to get more clarity before voting."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob

Day 1 begins.
